review: Very patient and understanding. medicines worked wonderfully. 10/10 recommended. Followed the diet and rest advised by doctor.

While the Doctor was polite ******* * **** ***** *** * **** ** ***************** ***** she was carrying an infact in her lap and it was a video consultation so it made me anxious since the baby was trying to grab camera and doctor was little in a hurry to finish the call.
Dr was listening to all my issues with patience was asking about if i had couple other symptoms to make sure and understand the right problem
